title: No No Shower
description: Did you ever think that a children's story could solve behavioral problems?Ron is an adorable baby swan who doesn't want to bathe, ever! Because of that, his other animal friends don’t want to play with him as he gets dirtier and dirtier, and starts to smell bad.Mommy and Daddy swan are really at their wits end, and simply don’t know what to do about bath time. They turn for advice to a wise owl. What solution will they find?
author: Carmit Kagan
